_sText:
"gg_2012"

2012:  Disaster. The world has flooded. After weeks of worldwide earthquakes the earthâ€™s tectonic plates have shifted, some are completely submerged now by oceans.  Now, an epic battle between good and evil rages for one of the last pieces of land still left in Central America.  Luckily for our combatants, there is still plenty of guns and ammo laying around on the island to fight each other.  Good Luck and Have Fun!

-	48 Spawns
-	Buy Zones
-	Nav file for bots
-	Overview Radar Map
-	Cube Maps
-	Optimized with No Draw for better FPS
-	Skeleton by Slow
-	Custom skybox by Komaokc
-	Everything is packaged into the .bsp with Pakrat

Blair (Bobpoblo) Burkhardt - Level Design
http://www.fpsbanana.com/members/776402
